description: After the ultimate guacamole recipe? Try this version of creamy guacamole, and make your own crispy roast vegetable chips for the perfect dippers.
keywords: Best Guacamole With Roasted Vegetable Chips
name: Best Guacamole With Roasted Vegetable Chips Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon guacamole into a shallow bowl. Top with remaining coriander and extra onion. Drizzle with remaining oil and season with pepper. Serve with vegetable chip.
